name: Volcanic Hellblaze
text: Cannot be targeted by card effects. You can Special Summon this card by sending 1 "Volcanic" card and 1 "Blaze Accelerator" card from your hand or field to the GY. This card gains 500 ATK for each "Volcanic" card in your GY. You can banish up to 3 "Volcanic Scattershot" from your GY; this card gains an additional attack for each one banished.
